message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $70?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I can do $82.50, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $82.50 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $75?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $80, but I'm not going to go any lower than that.
